text:
Hi,
I've a rewrite rule as follows wherein i need to escape %2. The Apache 
webserver seems to be converting %2 to %25 automatically. How do i fix this? 
Any help would be greatly appreciated.

RewriteRule ^/XT1 http://www.egroupnet.com/3m/commercialcare/xt%2D1/ 
[R=301,L,NS,NC]

I tried with "unescape", but of no use.

RewriteMap unescaper int:unescape
RewriteRule ^/XT1 http://www.egroupnet.com/3m/commercialcare/xt${unescaper:\%2}
D1/ [R=301,L,NS,NC]
creator: mani55119@yahoo.com

text:
(In reply to comment #0)
> Hi,
> I've a rewrite rule as follows wherein i need to escape %2. The Apache 
> webserver seems to be converting %2 to %25 automatically. How do i fix this? 
> Any help would be greatly appreciated.
> RewriteRule ^/XT1 http://www.egroupnet.com/3m/commercialcare/xt%2D1/ 
> [R=301,L,NS,NC]
> I tried with "unescape", but of no use.
> RewriteMap unescaper int:unescape
> RewriteRule ^/XT1 http://www.egroupnet.com/3m/commercialcare/xt${unescaper:\%
2}
> D1/ [R=301,L,NS,NC]

(In reply to comment #0)
> Hi,
> I've a rewrite rule as follows wherein i need to escape %2. The Apache 
> webserver seems to be converting %2 to %25 automatically. How do i fix this? 
> Any help would be greatly appreciated.
> RewriteRule ^/XT1 http://www.egroupnet.com/3m/commercialcare/xt%2D1/ 
> [R=301,L,NS,NC]
> I tried with "unescape", but of no use.
> RewriteMap unescaper int:unescape
> RewriteRule ^/XT1 http://www.egroupnet.com/3m/commercialcare/xt${unescaper:\%
2}
> D1/ [R=301,L,NS,NC]

(In reply to comment #1)
> How about
> RewriteRule ^/XT1 http://www.egroupnet.com/3m/commercialcare/xt\%2D1/
> [R=301,L,NS,NC,NE]
> ?

Hi,
This really did work. Thanks a lot for your help.
creator: mani55119@yahoo.com
